name: Private Yacht Charter
description: If you want to take your vacation to the next level, than you have to jump aboard our top of the line catamaran. This is a 1993 56 foot sailing catamaran Fountaine Pajot Marquises that was just completely refurbished in 2012. We added new engines, new sails, new mast, new paint, new electronics and safety gear. This amazing boat has 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, full gallery kitchen, deluxe bar for serving drinks, living room with two sofas, large outside cockpit, two large front trampolines and Rockford Fosgate sound system with 12 speakers and 3 subs throughout the boat.
